data.title: College Football Hall of Fame Inductees 1971-1980
data.meta_description: Class of 1971 Eddie Anderson, Coach, Loras/DePaul/Holy Cross/Iowa, 1922-1924 Albert “Benny” Benbrook, Guard, Michigan, 1908-1910 Charley Brewer, Fullback, Harvard, 1892-1895 Gary Cochran, End, Princeton, 1894-1897 Bill “Big Bill” Edwards, Guard, Princeton, 1896-1899 Nello “Flash” Falaschi, Quarterback, Santa Clara, 1934-1936 Doc Fenton, End/Quarterback, Mansfield/Louisiana State, 1904-1909 Joe “O-gee-Chideah (Big Brave)” Guyon,…
